oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: In Person... Little Jimmy Dickens and Red Sovine
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Dickens, Little Jimmy, 1920-2015; Sovine, Red;
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Two color window card (black on yellow) announcing Little Jimmy Dickens, "Red" Sovine and the Gadabouts coming to the High School Auditorium in Dalhart on December 1. Event sponsored by Chamber of Commerce and American Legion. Poster features metal photoplate of Jimmy Dickens and "Red" Sovine.
